entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING , Chatham-Kent
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 03:55 AM EST Wednesday 25 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -0.5°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Chatham-Kent 04:56 AM EST Wednesday 25 January 2023
Condition: Light Snow
Temperature: -0.5°C
Pressure: 101.8 kPa
Visibility: 2.8 km
Humidity: 94 %
Wind Chill: -5
Dewpoint: -1.4°C
Wind: ESE 13 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 3

entry.title: Wednesday: Snow at times heavy. Temperature steady near zero.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy. Amount 10 cm. Wind becoming east 30 km/h gusting to 50 early this morning. Temperature steady near zero. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Wednesday 25 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Snow. Temperature steady near zero.
entry.summary: Snow ending near midnight then cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind east 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light early this evening. Wind becoming west 20 gusting to 40 late this evening. Temperature steady near zero. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Wednesday 25 January 2023
